import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react'; import { useEffect } from 'react'; import './Dashboard.css' const Home = () => { const [count, setCount] = useState(); const getcount=async()=>{ const res = await fetch('https://disease.sh/v3/covid-19/all'); const actualCount = await res.json(); console.log(actualCount); setCount(actualCount); }; useEffect (()=>{ getcount(); },[]) return ( <>

) } export default Home
